channel.title: Need urgent help with server!
channel.description:
I have problems running and connecting to my server but heres the first problem.....I get this huge ass message which I don't even get. [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/20ickyv.png[/img] I've tried almost everything but will ask for more help.....I've tried downgrading my JRE7 to JRE6 and so forth..
And my second problem is more I need help with: [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2r3wehd.png[/img] Error connecting to server, not to sound noobish or anything but my whole time i've been coding this has never happened and no this server isn't online I haven't portforwarded it anyway or done anything it should be running offline mode or something like that and I don't know if it's configured to be some online server so could anyone please have any suggestions or anything?

item.title: Need urgent help with server!
item.dc:creator: @monetta monetta
item.description:
@monetta wrote:

I have problems running and connecting to my server but heres the first problem…I get this huge ass message which I don’t even get.

20ickyv.png669×978

I’ve tried almost everything but will ask for more help…I’ve tried downgrading my JRE7 to JRE6 and so forth…

And my second problem is more I need help with:

2r3wehd.png780×541

Error connecting to server, not to sound noobish or anything but my whole time i’ve been coding this has never happened and no this server isn’t online I haven’t portforwarded it anyway or done anything it should be running offline mode or something like that and I don’t know if it’s configured to be some online server so could anyone please have any suggestions or anything?
